basics.name: Sachin S
basics.label: Cybersecurity Analyst & Machine Learning Enthusiast
basics.summary: Aspiring Cybersecurity Analyst and Machine Learning enthusiast with a strong background in data analytics, cybersecurity tools, and AI-driven solutions. Experienced in operations analysis, penetration testing, and leading cybersecurity communities.

work.name: ATMEGA Software Technologies

Leveraged knowledge in network security and tools like Metasploit
